TopicTitle: Craft loads fine - but reloads broken?

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I need some help here. I have a tank that i used a lot of offset and rotate on, and for some reason it loads fine, and i can play with it in -game. However, when i reload (through F9, tracking view, or revert to launch) it comes out looking like this:

![EWbueHK.png](http://i.imgur.com/EWbueHK.png)

Why is this happening? The debug says it's no node, which is weird. Is there any way i can save my craft?
Can you please upload the craft Zekes, one of us may be able to fix it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Can you please upload the craft Zekes, one of us may be able to fix it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yeah sure, here it is:

[https://www./?1b5jrbrwh50f28s](https://www./?1b5jrbrwh50f28s)

The version before it worked fine, but i went back and rebuilt a lot of the side armor, most notably angling it with the rotate tool. Might that be it?

Thanks by the way ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Zekes, where's the root part?

bottom plate, underside - just under the turret.

EDIT: I keep switching the root part, but it just changes which part of the craft reloads broken. I'm 99% sure it's the side armor, going to tear parts off untill i find it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-18T00:21:54Z" title="03/18/2015 12:21  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 18, 2015</time> by zekes**

Well it's the Mk3 cockpit now, and it's working ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

[**Linky**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xrpk3yzco1trfxh/Challenger%20IV%20Green.craft?dl=0)

\*Kerbpaint not guaranteed to be working

> 
> Well it's the Mk3 cockpit now, and it's working ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> [**Linky**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xrpk3yzco1trfxh/Challenger%20IV%20Green.craft?dl=0)
> 
> \*Kerbpaint not guaranteed to be working

That's fine, I can live with that ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Can you try loading it, decoupling the Mk3 and the turret (just spacebar twice), and quicksaving and reloading? when i do that the hull disappears and game lags, miiight still happen? I hope not.
Yeah I tried that, all the parts were still there ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Yeah I tried that, all the parts were still there ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

You truly are a savior ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Thank you so much!

> 
> No probs, have fun ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yessssss it loaded right ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) thanks sal
